title: Optimum Wifi Shut Down in Area Mid Game
body: So I was in the middle of a ranked game playing Riven top when the optimum service had begun having issues in my area which ultimately lead to me disconnecting mid game. I was wondering if I am going to receive a ban/low priority queue due to this involuntary event

replies.body: Oh damn, sorry to hear about the ISP troubles.  :(  Hopefully everything is working fine now.  A [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) doesn't happen for only one game, but a history of leaving.  Unless you've consistently left games you should be okay.  Hope that helps offer some ease.
